packages.title: Lamu Island
packages.description: Experience the tranquil beauty of Lamu Island with its pristine beaches and rich Swahili culture.
highlights: Explore the narrow streets of Lamu Old Town
Relax on the stunning Shela Beach
Enjoy traditional dhow sailing trips
Visit historical sites and ancient ruins

packages.title: Diani Beach
packages.description: Indulge in the tropical paradise of Diani Beach with its pristine white sands and turquoise waters.
highlights: Snorkeling and diving in the vibrant coral reefs
Relaxation and sunbathing on the beach
Water sports activities like jet skiing and kiteboarding
Explore nearby wildlife reserves and sanctuaries

packages.title: Amboseli National Park
packages.description: Embark on an unforgettable safari adventure in Amboseli National Park, home to iconic wildlife and breathtaking landscapes.
highlights: Game drives to spot elephants, lions, and other wildlife
Scenic views of Mount Kilimanjaro
Guided nature walks and birdwatching
Visit Maasai cultural villages

packages.title: Watamu Coastal Region
packages.description: Escape to the picturesque coastal town of Watamu and immerse yourself in its stunning beaches, coral reefs, and marine life.
highlights: Snorkeling and diving in the vibrant coral reefs
Relaxation and sunbathing on pristine beaches
Boat trips to Watamu Marine National Park
Explore the Gede Ruins

packages.title: Maasai Mara Safari
packages.description: Embark on an extraordinary safari experience in the world-famous Maasai Mara National Reserve, renowned for its spectacular wildlife sightings.
highlights: Unforgettable game drives in search of the Big Five
Witness the Great Migration (seasonal)
Interact with Maasai tribes and learn about their culture
Hot air balloon safaris at sunrise

packages.title: Mount Kenya Trek
packages.description: Embark on a thrilling adventure to conquer Mount Kenya, Africa's second-highest peak, and explore its diverse alpine landscapes.
highlights: Challenging trekking routes and breathtaking views
Camp in high-altitude alpine zones
Encounter unique flora and fauna
Professional mountain guides and porters
included: Accommodation in mountain huts and campsites
